level.heading: Appeals.
level.text: An appeal may be taken from a final order in a proceeding under this subchapter. The appeal shall be considered on an expedited basis. Unless the court enters a temporary emergency order under section 16-4602.04, the enforcing court may not stay an order enforcing a child-custody determination pending appeal.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For D.C. Law 13-293, see notes following ยง 16-4601.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 314 of the Uniform Child Custody Jurisdiction and Enforcement Act (1997 Act). See 9, Part IA, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
